text: Egha Iesus ua kamaghɨn mɨgei, “Nɨn aveghbuam arazir kuram nɨ damightɨ, nɨ an bighan mangɨ egh gua uaningra ikɨva nɨ a ko gua bizir kam anekɨrigh. A nɨ baraghtɨ, nɨ ua uan aveghbuam inigham.18:15 Vezɨn kamɨn itir mɨgɨrɨgɨar otevim, “nɨ damightɨma,” fofozir gumazir maba kamaghɨn nɨghnɨsi, gumazir ti igharazim an osiri. Matyu uabɨ puvatɨ.
